headline: KKR Prices $550,000,000 of 6.875% Subordinated Notes due 2065
summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. ("KKR") (NYSE: KKR) today announced that it has priced its previously announced offering of $550,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 6.875% Subordinated Notes due 2065 (the "notes"). The notes will be subordinated obligations of KKR and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by KKR Group Partnership L.P. The underwriters have a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional $82,500,000 aggregate principal amount of notes, solely to cover over-all

headline: KKR (NYSE:KKR) Launches Subordinated Notes Offering Due 2065 for Corporate Purposes
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) recently initiated an offering of subordinated notes due 2065, which may have supported its stock price despite a reported Q1 net loss of $186 million, a decline from last year's net income. The company's efforts in broadening its investment offerings, such as launching new interval funds and maintaining shareholder returns through dividends and share buybacks, also aligned with broader market gains. While the S&P 500 has experienced a moderate rise, KKR's notable 21% price...

headline: KKR Announces Offering of Subordinated Notes
summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. ("KKR") (NYSE: KKR) today announced that it has commenced an offering of subordinated notes due 2065 (the "notes"), subject to market and other conditions. The notes will be subordinated obligations of KKR and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by KKR Group Partnership L.P. KKR expects to grant the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase additional notes, solely to cover over-allotments, if any.

raw.headline: KKR Announces Offering of Subordinated Notes
raw.summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. ("KKR") (NYSE: KKR) today announced that it has commenced an offering of subordinated notes due 2065 (the "notes"), subject to market and other conditions. The notes will be subordinated obligations of KKR and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by KKR Group Partnership L.P. KKR expects to grant the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase additional notes, solely to cover over-allotments, if any.

headline: KKR Releases "The Art of Learning"
summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--KKR, a leading global investment firm, today released "The Art of Learning," a new Insights piece by Henry McVey, CIO of KKR’s Balance Sheet and Head of Global Macro and Asset Allocation (GMAA).

headline: Bridging the Retirement Gap: Global Atlantic Survey Unveils Surprising Differences in Priorities Between Financial Advisors and Their Clients
summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--A new survey from Global Atlantic Financial Group ("Global Atlantic") reveals an opportunity for financial professionals to get even more aligned with their customer regarding what matters most to them related to retirement income priorities and investment protection strategies. For example, 88% of investors, but only 66% of advisors, prioritize investments for retirement that provide a steady income stream. Similarly, over eight in 10 investors (83%) view guaranteed inco

headline: Iran’s Khamenei Says Nuclear Deal Is Unlikely in Rebuke to Trump
